summary: The customer was not happy with their purchase from Contoso Wireless and expressed their dissatisfaction to the agent. The agent apologized for any miscommunication and offered to waive the early termination fee if the customer chose to downgrade their service plan. The customer agreed and was given instructions on how to contact customer service in order to downgrade their service plan. The agent concluded by wishing the customer a satisfactory experience and looking forward to serving them in the future.
